post.body: LOVE that song, too! honestly, love the whole album. for reals.
<pensively> yes. but keep listening, put it on in the background while you do dishes or fold laundry or read. let it absorb...
And never doubt me again, grasshopper. lol
don't judge me, but I know that's a Star Wars reference, but I don't get it bc I've never seen any of the movies....
it IS all about the Corona! Now get to listenin' :)
so, what's the verdict? decemberists, thumbs up or thumbs down?
Thanks! Are you back in VA yet?!?! I still owe you a drink!
Good! You can report back to me tomorrow :)
try Crane Wife 3 and then try the other songs after that. The whole album is awesome though!
good music for rainy days (aside from yours, good everyday of course!) is the decemberists. love it!
OMG I love Flight of the Conchords so much! Can't wait for the new season to start!
BE CAREFUL!!!
off until Tuesday and I'm totally thinking about going to bed in the very near future. what am I, like 8?
psyched to be the NOVA coordinator for the Nat' Day of Service for the Inaugural Committee. Volunteer!
last day of mentoring for 2008! kiddie holiday party, here I come!
already salivating over my @starbucks chai in the morning. is this the first sign of addiction?
alright, I've made up with my iTunes. now I can get fired up and ready to go. plans are in the works!
fighting with my iTunes. sigh.
anyone know any GREAT professional framers in Alexandria that can get a job done QUICK?
my car looks better on the side that was hit than it does on the side that wasn't! sweet! and the portrait came in today- looks amazing!
OMG, my car is ready to be picked up! I don't know if I'm glad or not, I really kinda liked my rental car...
gift wrapping and creating the famous West Family Christmas Card, whilst watching It's A Wonderful Life!
our front yard is the nexus of the dead leaf universe. seriously. happy 2009!
Dear Stupid People, please leave me alone. Thanks. Signed, Chrisi
yaaaaaaaaaaay! another long weekend starting at noon today!
full of Hope.
needs an extra hand :(
feeling down so i thought this might cheer me up a little: http://tinyurl.com/5y22p (21 days! the countdown begins!)
feeling blah today.
super unmotivated anymore, which worries me a little. and impatient for the fashion show.
omg so annoyed right now.
thinking I'll upgrade Jeff's Christmas gift on my way home, and then put off cleaning by finally planning my 1-year-overdue trip to Europe.
working on my Happiness Project then it's back to the IA for me!
happy first day back to work after the holidays! yay!
what a lovely holiday. and now I'm SO glad I'm home.
Merry Christmas and happy holidays to all my friends! off to PA I go! home on Sunday night! laters!
Christmas-ing with Jeffrey today in VA! National Christmas Tree, here we come!
writing teasers. yes, I'm at work today (at least until lunch). lucky for me I love my job!
is it possible I'm still recovering from the campaign? because I have very little motivation right now to do anything. weird.
suddenly occurred to me that I might have some pretty shady friends. now what?
